summary: A small house on the river in Riverwood all with no load doors! (EXTERIOR HOUSE)
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-DESCRIPTION-

A small house on the river in Riverwood all with no load doors, there in a map marker right next to Riverwood.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"Cozy, simple and immersive starter home. Open to the world as well. Exactly my taste." - dikr

"Wow, this is a fantastic little house mod! It looks like a perfect little home in a perfect little location. I love being able to see the bubbling brook in the creek, from the windows of this home. The chicken coop also makes a handy stable to park my horse for a while. This mods works with most other Riverwood mods (I've tried almost all of them!, and sits snugly beside these ones (highly recommended)..

Hot Springs Home: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23089
Riverside Cabin: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17800" - vvk78

"Totally adorable house. Its too cute not to keep." - begothprincess

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-NOTE-

I am aware of bugs like the flicking textures, raining inside and a few other things which will be fixed in the next update along with tweaks and enhancements to the house.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-INSTALLATION-

Install manually into your Skyrim Data folder and make sure you have activated the file in "DATA FILES" of your Skyrim launcher

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-UNINSTALLATION-

Simply delete "Riverwood Home.esp"

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Rhys Ian Harris
